alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampshire; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Southeast Middlesex; Western Essex; Western Franklin; Western Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 19 at 2:50PM EST until January 20 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...A Wintry mix of snow, sleet and rain. Pockets of light freezing rain possible mainly in the high terrain. Snow and sleet accumulations of 1 to 5 inches with the higher amounts north route 2 and particularly near the New Hampshire border. Ice accumulations of a light glaze to less than one tenth of an inch in the high terrain of the Berks and Worcester Hills. * WHERE...Portions of central, eastern, northeastern and western Massachusetts. * WHEN...Until 6 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions for the evening commute...mainly north of route 2. Mixed precipitation will change to all snow Friday morning and continue at times into Friday afternoon. This may result in some slippery travel, although the snow may struggle to accumulate on roadways in the lower elevations given marginal temperatures. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow down and use caution while traveling. &&
